title: Powder Monkey Esports LF Players
body:
Hey Guys,

Powder Monkey Esports are looking for players again in all role's. 

We are ideally looking for season 7 Diamond Players but will consider high plats of season 7 as well.

The Team will compete regularly so its important that u are able to be free and play at times such as Thursday Evenings and Weekends.

We Are also looking for coaches or managers that are willing to gain experience as well! 

For More Information Please add Akeno Himejima Or STS Cola
